page.title: 03HEATHHALL INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The hangars and other buildings on an old airfield are used for storage, factories and retail stores. Factories include metal works, sawmill, joinery and bakery. Some contract others to do some work for them e.g. "Badgers" screen print bags for a bag factory. Most of the aircraft hangars are used for storing chemicals, alcohol and E.E.C. surplus grain. other smaller stores include meat, and materials for a new Telecom line. Shops sell mostly household goods. The old runway is used for testing vehicles like fire engines etc. It is also used by learner drivers, and for pigeon racing and flying model planes.
